Title: The Bell Tolls
Description:
Those bells mean Mereldar is under attack! 

Let's get to the gates and find out what is going on.
ObjectivesText: Go to the main gates of Mereldar in Hallowfall.
RewardText:
We will make them pay for this, $n. 

We will hit them so hard they never come back.

Objectives.Text: Go to the Gates of Mereldar
